FCCANALYSIS-TEST(1) fccanalysis-test man page FCCANALYSIS-TEST(1)

NAME

fccanalysis-test - test FCCAnalyses framework

SYNOPSIS

fccanalysis test [-h | --help] [-R TESTS_REGEX] [-E EXCLUDE_REGEX]

DESCRIPTION

fccanalysis-test will test the whole or a part of the FCC analysis framework. It is not intended as a replacement for running ctest command directly in the build directory, it is just convenience shortcut.

OPTIONS

-h, --help

Prints short help message and exits.

[test_regex]

Specify subset of tests to be run.

SEE ALSO

fccanalysis(1), fccanalysis-build(7), ctest(1)

BUGS

Many

AUTHORS

There are many contributors to the FCCAnalyses framework, but the principal authors are:

Clement Helsens
Valentin Volk
Gerardo Ganis

FCCANALYSES

Part of the FCCAnalyses framework.
